trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for installed and private font collections.
trans-unit.target: 提供安裝和私用字型集合的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The FontCollection allows you to get a list of the font families contained in the collection with its <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FontCollection 可讓您取得包含集合中使用的字型家族清單及其<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關字型和文字，包括範例程式碼，請參閱[使用字型和文字](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>所佔用。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> </xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>參考。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>與此相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。
